name: ServiceNow Security Incident Response (SIR)
description: ServiceNow Security Incident Response (SIR) allows your organization to manage the life cycle of your security incidents from initial analysis to containment, eradication, and recovery.

options.name: URL
options.description: The URL of the ServiceNow instance to connect to including the schema (i.e., https://)

options.name: Username
options.description: The username to login to ServiceNow with

options.name: Password
options.description: The password to login to ServiceNow with

options.name: API Key
options.description: The API Key used to access ServiceNow Rest API.  If this is being used, then you will not need to use a Username and Password. This API Key will be prioritized over the username password combination.

options.name: API Key Request Header Name
options.description: The API Key request header to be used if authenticating via API Key.  Defaults to `x-sn-apikey`.
